alert.note: Alert for Washington (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 6:58PM EDT until May 06 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SULLIVAN...JOHNSON AND SOUTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 658 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Abingdon to near Mountain City to Lovill, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bristol Tn, Mountain City, Damascus, Trade, Neva, Laurel Bloomery, Harr, Shady Valley and Konnarock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for east Tennessee...and southwestern Virginia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
